p: The taxonomic classification of miracle fruit plant is presented in Table 1. The online plant database, The Plant List, includes 164 scientific plant names of species rank for the genus Synsepalum. Of these, 29 are accepted species names, including Synsepalum dulcificum (Schumach. & Thonn.) Daniell ( The Plant List, 2020). Synsepalum dulcificum was formerly known as Richadella dulcifica and other synonyms ( Bartoshuk et al., 1974; Ohkura et al., 2018).
